mapper.select: SELECT research_no, research_q, research_a1, research_a1text, research_a2, research_a2text FROM research
SELECT CASE WHEN research_a1text = #{answer} THEN research_a1 END AS left_val FROM research WHERE research_a1text = #{answer};
SELECT CASE WHEN research_a2text = #{answer} THEN research_a2 END AS left_val FROM research WHERE research_a2text = #{answer};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research (research_q, research_a1, research_a1text, research_a2, research_a2text) VALUES (#{research_q}, #{research_a1}, #{research_a1text}, #{research_a2}, #{research_a2text})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN research_a1text = #{selectedValues} THEN research_a1 END AS result FROM research WHERE research_a1text = #{selectedValues} AND research_q = #{questions};
SELECT CASE WHEN research_a2text = #{selectedValues} THEN research_a2 END AS result FROM research WHERE research_a2text = #{selectedValues} AND research_q = #{questions};
